symf.name: HEAP_GENERATE_EXCEPTIONS
symf.desc: The system will raise an exception to indicate a function failure, such as an out-of-memory condition, instead of returning NULL.

symf.name: HEAP_NO_SERIALIZE
symf.desc: Serialized access will not be used for this allocation

symf.name: HEAP_ZERO_MEMORY
symf.desc: The allocated memory will be initialized to zero. Otherwise, the memory is not initialized to zero.
